title-part.text: TREATMENT, e.g. PRESERVATION, OF FLOUR OR DOUGH, e.g. BY ADDITION OF MATERIALS
Treatment of flour or dough by adding materials thereto before or during baking

reference.text: batters, dough or mixtures before baking A21D10/00

note.note-paragraph: In groups A21D2/02 - A21D2/40, the last place priority rule is applied, i.e. at each hierarchical level, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, a substance is classified in the last appropriate place.

CPC-specific-text.text: from leguminous or other vegetable seeds; from press-cake or oil bearing seeds

title-part.text: Apparatus for the chemical treatment of flour or dough
Preserving flour or dough before baking by storage in an inert atmosphere
Other treatment of flour or dough before baking, e.g. cooling, irradiating, heating
Methods for preparing or baking dough

reference.text: treatment of flour or dough by adding materials A21D2/00

title-part.text: treating dough with microorganisms or enzymes

CPC-specific-text.text: with a leaven or a composition containing acidifying bacteria

title-part.text: Prevention of sticking, e.g. to baking plates
Batters, dough or mixtures before baking

CPC-specific-text.text: Dough mixes; Baking or bread improvers; Premixes
Solid, dry or compact materials; Granules; Powders

title-part.text: Finished or partly finished bakery products
Products containing bran or rough-ground grain
Products made from materials other than rye or wheat flour

note.note-paragraph:
Group A21D13/04 is impacted by reclassification into groups A21D13/043, A21D13/045 and A21D13/047.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: from tubers, e.g. manioc or potato

note.note-paragraph:
Group A21D13/043 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A21D13/04.
Groups A21D13/04 and A21D13/043 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A21D13/045 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A21D13/04.
Groups A21D13/04 and A21D13/045 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: from cereals other than rye or wheat, e.g. rice

note.note-paragraph:
Group A21D13/047 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A21D13/04.
Groups A21D13/04 and A21D13/047 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Products with modified nutritive value, e.g. with modified starch content
made of two or more doughs, e.g. differing in composition, colour or structure

reference.text: multi-layered bakery products with coatings A21D13/13, A21D13/17

title-part.text: the coating forming a barrier against migration
Filled, to be filled or stuffed products

reference.text: multi-layered products with fillings A21D13/14, A21D13/19

title-part.text: filled or to be filled after baking, e.g. sandwiches
Edible containers, e.g. cups or cones
the filling forming a barrier against migration
Co-extruded products, i.e. products obtained by simultaneous extrusion of the dough and the filling
Products characterised by the type, form or use

note.note-paragraph:
Group A21D13/40 is impacted by reclassification into groups A21D13/43. A21D13/40 and A21D13/43
should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A21D13/43 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A21D13/40.
Groups A21D13/40 and A21D13/43 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Products with an additional function other than for eating, e.g. toys or cutlery
Pastry not otherwise provided for elsewhere, e.g. cakes, biscuits or cookies

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. with microbiocidal agents, with protective films
, e.g. with microbiocidal agents, with protective films
Recycling, e.g. for use in baking or for animal consumption
